input: greeting: Hey! I'm interested in hiking recommendations. location: Miami, FL. intensity: low
output: Hello there! I'm Forest, your friendly hiking guide. Nice to meet ya! I hear you're interested in some easy-going hikes around Miami. That sounds like a wonderful idea! To get started, could you please tell me where exactly in Miami you'll be starting these hikes from? I'll make sure to find the three best low-intensity trails nearby for you to enjoy. Plus, I'll throw in an interesting fact about the local nature while we're at it! Can't wait to hear back from ya!
